trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: Beispiel

trans-unit.source: How old are you?
trans-unit.target: Wie alt sind Sie?

trans-unit.source: Under 40
trans-unit.target: Under 40

trans-unit.source: Over 80
trans-unit.target: Over 80

trans-unit.source: What is your current living situation?
trans-unit.target: What is your current living situation?

trans-unit.source: Living alone
trans-unit.target: Living alone

trans-unit.source: Living together with family, in a shared flat, or in a supervised community facility
trans-unit.target: Living together with family, in a shared flat, or in a supervised community facility

trans-unit.source: At least once a week, do you privately care for people with age-related conditions, chronic illnesses, or frailty?
trans-unit.target: At least once a week, do you privately care for people with age-related conditions, chronic illnesses, or frailty?

trans-unit.source: Do you work in one of the following areas?
trans-unit.target: Do you work in one of the following areas?

trans-unit.source: In the medical field
trans-unit.target: In the medical field

trans-unit.source: In a community facility (school, day care center, university, home etc.)
trans-unit.target: In a community facility (school, day care center, university, home etc.)

trans-unit.source: No, in none of the above
trans-unit.target: No, in none of the above

trans-unit.source: Do you smoke?
trans-unit.target: Do you smoke?

trans-unit.source: Are you pregnant?
trans-unit.target: Are you pregnant?

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: I don't know
trans-unit.target: I don't know

trans-unit.source: Have you had close contact with a confirmed case?
trans-unit.target: Have you had close contact with a confirmed case?

trans-unit.source: Choose "No" if you have worn adequate protective measures (mask, smock) on contact.
trans-unit.target: Choose "No" if you have worn adequate protective measures (mask, smock) on contact.

trans-unit.source: What day was the last contact?
trans-unit.target: What day was the last contact?

trans-unit.source: Have you had a fever (over 38°C) in the past 24 hours?
trans-unit.target: Have you had a fever (over 38°C) in the past 24 hours?

trans-unit.source: What was the highest temperature, approx.?
trans-unit.target: What was the highest temperature, approx.?

trans-unit.source: More than 42°C
trans-unit.target: More than 42°C

trans-unit.source: Have you had chills in the past 24 hours?
trans-unit.target: Have you had chills in the past 24 hours?

trans-unit.source: Which of the following symptoms have you had in the past 24 hours? (multiple selection possible)
trans-unit.target: Which of the following symptoms have you had in the past 24 hours? (multiple selection possible)

trans-unit.source: Feeling tired or weak
trans-unit.target: Feeling tired or weak

trans-unit.source: Body aches
trans-unit.target: Body aches

trans-unit.source: Diarrhea
trans-unit.target: Diarrhea

trans-unit.source: Headache
trans-unit.target: Headache

trans-unit.source: Loss of taste and/or smell
trans-unit.target: Loss of taste and/or smell

trans-unit.source: If you don't have any of the symptoms, don't select an entry and continue by choosing the "Next" button.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have any of the symptoms, don't select an entry and continue by choosing the "Next" button.

trans-unit.source: In the past 24 hours, have you had a persistent cough?
trans-unit.target: In the past 24 hours, have you had a persistent cough?

trans-unit.source: If you have a chronic cough, compare your current coughing to your regular problems.
trans-unit.target: If you have a chronic cough, compare your current coughing to your regular problems.

trans-unit.source: In the past 24 hours, have you had a runny nose?
trans-unit.target: In the past 24 hours, have you had a runny nose?

trans-unit.source: The question relates to cold symptoms and excludes chronic runny nose, seasonal or allergy-related runny nose. If you have chronic sniffling, compare your current conditions with your existing problems.
trans-unit.target: The question relates to cold symptoms and excludes chronic runny nose, seasonal or allergy-related runny nose. If you have chronic sniffling, compare your current conditions with your existing problems.

trans-unit.source: In the past 24 hours, have you had a sore throat?
trans-unit.target: In the past 24 hours, have you had a sore throat?

trans-unit.source: In the past 24 hours, did you feel that you were more quickly out of breath than usual?
trans-unit.target: In the past 24 hours, did you feel that you were more quickly out of breath than usual?

trans-unit.source: If you have chronic lung disease, compare your current breathing problems with your existing breathing problems.
trans-unit.target: If you have chronic lung disease, compare your current breathing problems with your existing breathing problems.

trans-unit.source: With regard to all questions about symptoms: since when have you had the symptoms you specified?
trans-unit.target: With regard to all questions about symptoms: since when have you had the symptoms you specified?

trans-unit.source: Have you been diagnosed with chronic lung disease by a doctor?
trans-unit.target: Have you been diagnosed with chronic lung disease by a doctor?

trans-unit.source: Have you been diagnosed with diabetes by a doctor?
trans-unit.target: Have you been diagnosed with diabetes by a doctor?

trans-unit.source: Have you been diagnosed with heart disease by a doctor?
trans-unit.target: Have you been diagnosed with heart disease by a doctor?

trans-unit.source: Have you been diagnosed with obesity by a doctor?
trans-unit.target: Have you been diagnosed with obesity by a doctor?

trans-unit.source: Are you currently taking steroids?
trans-unit.target: Are you currently taking steroids?

trans-unit.source: Are you currently taking immunosuppressants?
trans-unit.target: Are you currently taking immunosuppressants?

trans-unit.source: You take or get immunosuppresives after an organ transplant, in the therapy of an autoimmune disease, or during chemotherapy.
trans-unit.target: You take or get immunosuppresives after an organ transplant, in the therapy of an autoimmune disease, or during chemotherapy.

trans-unit.source: Have you been vaccinated against flu between October 2019 and today?
trans-unit.target: Have you been vaccinated against flu between October 2019 and today?

trans-unit.source: Consent to the transmission of your postal code and recommended action?
trans-unit.target: Consent to the transmission of your postal code and recommended action?

trans-unit.source: You can find more information in the data protection declaration.
trans-unit.target: You can find more information in the data protection declaration.

trans-unit.source: What's your postal code?
trans-unit.target: What's your postal code?

trans-unit.source: You can enter your postal code here. By specifying your postal code, you allow us to map the data you donated on a map of Germany. This enables us further understand the spread of the pandemic.
trans-unit.target: You can enter your postal code here. By specifying your postal code, you allow us to map the data you donated on a map of Germany. This enables us further understand the spread of the pandemic.

trans-unit.target: Risk Assessment

trans-unit.source: High Risk of SARS-Cov-2
trans-unit.target: High Risk of SARS-Cov-2

trans-unit.source: Typical symptoms of SARS-Cov-2 without contact.
trans-unit.target: Typical symptoms of SARS-Cov-2 without contact.

trans-unit.source: No symptoms, but contact with case.
trans-unit.target: No symptoms, but contact with case.

trans-unit.source: Symptoms indicate a cold.
trans-unit.target: Symptoms indicate a cold.

trans-unit.source: No risk
trans-unit.target: No risk

trans-unit.target: Medical advisory

trans-unit.target: You work in the medical field.

trans-unit.target: Contact advisory

trans-unit.source: Contact was irrellevant.
trans-unit.target: Contact was irrellevant.

trans-unit.target: Risk group advisory

trans-unit.source: You belong to the risk group
trans-unit.target: You belong to the risk group
